scripts.reset-db: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:dev: npx sequelize db:drop && npx sequelize db:create && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:test: npx sequelize --env=test db:drop && npx sequelize --env=test db:create && npx sequelize --env=test db:migrate && npx sequelize --env=test db:seed:all
